question: What screen resolutions and aspect ratios do Neat devices support on HDMI output?
answer:
HDMI Output

Aspect ratio 21:9 resolutions (Gen 2 devices only):

3840x1600 @ 60Hz
3440x1440 @ 60Hz (CVT-RB, old)
3440x1440 @ 60Hz (CVT, new)
2560x1080 @ 60Hz

Aspect ratio 16:9 resolutions:

3840x2160 @ 60Hz
3840x2160 @ 30Hz
1920x1080 @ 60Hz

For any resolution outside of these tested values, customers and partners should work with the TV or screen manufacturer to ensure a supported configuration.
